creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: card Table, folding, hinged top; Hepplewhite design; corners of top cut in recessed quarter-round design popular during the last ten years of the century; narrow inlay of holly forms panels on legs; in center of skirting are inlaid two swags from which hang pendant husks; above the legs are oval inlaid panels formed with the same wood
medium: Mahogany, maple, white pine with light wood inlay
title: Card table
